Workflow.Name: Admin | Sync Template v4 (Model Driven Apps)
Workflow.Description: This flow gets model-driven app information. This information is retrieved from underlying Dataverse tables and requires the user running the flow to have system administrator privileges in the environment.

LocalizedName.description: Admin | Sync Template v4 (Model Driven Apps)

Description.description: This flow gets model-driven app information. This information is retrieved from underlying Dataverse tables and requires the user running the flow to have system administrator privileges in the environment.
